artview.components.FieldButtonWindow¶

class artview.components.FieldButtonWindow(Vradar, Vfield, name='FieldButtons', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Class to display the Window with Field Buttons

__init__(Vradar, Vfield, name='FieldButtons', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters :

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable.

Vfield : Variable instance

Field signal variable.

[Optional] :

name : string

Field Radiobutton window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to FieldButtonWindow. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Notes

This class records the selected button and passes the change value back to variable.

Methods

FieldButtonWindow.CreateFieldWidget() Create a widget to store radio buttons to control field adjust.
FieldButtonWindow.FieldSelectCmd(field) Captures a selection and update field variable.
FieldButtonWindow.NewField(variable, value, ...) Slot for ‘ValueChanged’ signal of Vfield.
FieldButtonWindow.NewRadar(variable, value, ...) Slot for ‘ValueChanged’ signal of Vradar.
FieldButtonWindow.SetFieldRadioButtons() Set a field selection using radio buttons

Attributes

Vfield = None¶

see Shared Variables Table

Vradar = None¶

see Shared Variables Table
